message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $100 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm firm on the price.  I'm willing to come down to $110 to meet you halfway. This is a one-time offer, so let's close the deal!
